{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD wAP |revision=(RBwAP-2nD) |price=45 |fcc_date=12/09/2015 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=outdoor access point |fcc_id=TV7RBWAP2ND |ic_id=7442A-WAP2ND |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16DS-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MS156 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=E4:8D:8C |oui_eth=E4:8D:8C }} {{TagLine|Outdoor Wall Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAP2nD}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP (RBwAP-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RBwAP2nD RBwAP-2nD] ('''wAP''') - 2.4GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBWAP2ND TV7RBWAP2ND] (12/09/2015)
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz *Flash: Winbond W25Q128FVSG 16MB (SPI) *RAM: Nanya NT5DS32M16DS-5T 64MB (DDR SDRAM) *1x FE ports, PoE 802.3at, 802.11bgn, RouterOS Level 4 <!-- :J400/J401 - MS156 (Hirose MS-156 Coaxial Switch), MS-156C-LP-068 (no U.FL / MMCX) :PowerBox (RB750P-PBr2), hAP lite (RB941-2nD), hAP (RB951Ui-2nD), hEX lite (RB750r2) --> ===Reviews=== *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-tochki-dostupa-RBwAP2nD-wAP-Mikrotik ''MikroTik wAP (RBwAP2nD)'' on '''LANmarket'''] (RU)
===See also=== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP R (RBwAPR-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RBwAPR-2nD RBwAPR-2nD] ('''wAP R''') - 2.4GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7WAPR2ND TV7WAPR2ND] (08/07/2017) - ''MikroTik wAP R'' :1x FE ports, 1x Mini PCIe, PoE, 802.11bgn, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP ac (RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD] ('''wAP ac''') - 2.4/5GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBWAP5AC2D TV7RBWAP5AC2D] (11/09/2016) - ''MikroTik wAP ac'' :1x GbE ports, PoE 802.3at, 802.11abgn/ac, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9556 @720MHz, QCA9880, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP ac 2 (RBwAP2-5HacT2HnD)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD] ('''wAP ac2''') - 2.4/5GHz Outdoor Wall AP <!-- FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBWAPG-5HACT2HnD TV7RBWAPG-5HACT2HnD] ?? (RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD) --> :1x GbE ports, PoE 802.3at, 802.11abgn/ac, Wave 2, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9556 @720MHz, QCA9880, 16/64MB
